

h1. Export and Import Namespace




h1. Export a namespace

You easily export a namespaces into a *.xml* or a *.zip* file by following the simple guides below:

1.On the workspace "system" export : /jcr:system/exo:namespaces.

2. Select a namespace that you want to export.

2. Select the *Admin* tab.

3. Click the *Export Node* button and select the location to save the file.


!export-namespaces.png!


h1. Import a namespace

You can import nodes in *xml* format into JCR Explorer system by following the guides below:

1\. On the workspace "system" export : /jcr:system/exo:namespaces.

2. Select the *Admin* tab.

3.Click the *Import Node* button.

4. Click on *Choose File* to select a file that you want to import.

5. Click the *Import* button to upload the selected file.


!import-namespaces.png!
